topic.question: 1. A new car will cost 8,000 dollars or higher. How much will the car cost?
2. The student who arrived walks very rapidly. How does he walk?
3. Which of these would you keep in a tank?
4. James selected a book.
5. This is not the right road.
option: This is not the wrong road.
This is not the left road.

topic.question: 6. The weather will clear up.
7. John takes a shower daily. What does he take?
8. The movie will begin at three o'clock.
option: It will be over at 3 o'clock.

topic.question: 9. When we went on a picnic, we participated in many games.
10. Sally wanted to know what the box contained. What did she want to know?
11. John came to class on time.
option: He was in class for one hour.

topic.question: 12. The tailor said, "I don't think this coat needs any alterations." What did the tailor mean by "alterations?'
13. Did you bother Mr. James when you called?
option: No, he's home in the evening.

topic.question: 14. The clerk said, "There are only three rooms available in the hotel." What did the clerk mean?
option: There were reservations for three rooms.
Three rooms were ready to be used.
Three people were at the hotel.
There were three clerks at the hotel.

topic.question: 15. What kind of vehicle did you use?
16. We contacted our friends. What did we do?
17. Headquarters is next to the lab building.
option: It is across from the lab building.
It is beside the lab building.
It is under the lab building.
It is above the lab building.

topic.question: 18. We invited him to our home and he accepted.
19. Rick spent a great deal of time in the South. How much time did he spend there?
20. The truck was washed by the mechanic.
option: The mechanic looked at the truck.
The truck was repaired by the mechanic.
The truck was cleaned by the mechanic.

topic.question: 21. Gail said, "Remember your appointment with the doctor." What did Gail want me toremember?
option: to find out about the doctor

topic.question: 22. The box is aluminum.
option: It is made of light metal.

topic.question: 23. Walter spends an hour each day in physical training. What does Walter do?
option: He takes physical training every hour.
He goes to class for one hour.
He takes physical training every day.

topic.question: 24. How were you able to cross the Atlantic Ocean in such a short time?
25. John borrowed a pencil from Paul.
option: John likes Paul's pencil very much.
John and Paul kept the pencil.

topic.question: 26. What was the result of the accident?
27. John took a vacation. What did he take?

28. Mr. Long said, "I haven't seen Tom since the day before yesterday." When was the last time
that Mr. Long saw Tom?
29. The airmen decided to have their party at the club where they would have more space for dancing. Where would they have more space?
30. We were on a tour when the accident happened. What were we doing when the accident happened?
31. He was given an order to report to the office. What was he given?
32. Major Marcum guided the discussion. What did he do?
option: He spoke more than anyone else.
He kept people outside the room.

topic.question: 33. The children cooked their supper tonight. I didn't help them.
option: Supper was prepared by my wife.
My wife and I prepared the supper.
The children can't cook at all.
The children did all the work.

topic.question: 34. James is an efficient worker.
option: He does his work quickly and well.

topic.question: 35. I don't know whether he will come.
option: I don't know if he will come.
I don't know why he will come.
I don't know when he will come.
I don't know how he will come.

topic.question: 36. Harry made up his mind in a hurry.
option: He hurried and made a mistake.

topic.question: 37. You'd better hurry. It's sprinkling a little now.
option: There are a few seats left.

topic.question: 38. The instructions on the bulletin board told all personnel to turn in their weapons.
option: Everyone had to change their weapons.
All of them were issued new weapons.
All of them had to clean their weapons.

topic.question: 39. That student has a negative attitude.
40. The clerk will stack the boxes in the corner. What will he do with the boxes?
41. How is Mr. Jones getting along in his new job?
42. Who can use the public library?
43. The story was accurate.
44. The instructor wanted to leave out the new subject.
option: He wanted to review the new subject.
He wanted to begin the new subject.
He wanted to include the new subject.
He wanted to omit the new subject.

topic.question: 45. The restaurant is across from the public library.
option: The restaurant is opposite the library.
The restaurant is around the corner fro the library.
The restaurant is across town from the library.
The restaurant is at the other end of the library.

topic.question: 46. Annette said she got a new filling yesterday. What did she get?
option: a cavity filled by the dentist

topic.question: 47. We are having a thunder shower. What are we having?
48. The hotel manager said that Jim would operator the elevator today.  What will Jim do?
49. Why did the welder use goggles?
50. Since his illness, he can't do any heavy work.
51. Why don't you knock it off?
52. Did Anna complain about her trip?
option: Yes, she finished the trip a week ago.
Yes, she said she didn't like the food or the people.
No, she went both ways by boat
No, she had many suitcases with her.

topic.question: 53. He got grease all over his shirt. What was on his shirt?
54. John glanced at his wrist watch. What did he do?
option: He shook the watch with his hand.
He took a quick look at it.
He set the hands to the correct time.

topic.question: 55. Mr. Reed is a blacksmith in our town.
option: He makes iron shoes for horses
He mixes sand and gravel for cement.

topic.question:
56. John is careful and hard working.
He is _______.

57. W: What's the problem?
M: The water in this pipe is frozen.
Q: How did this happen?

58. W: I don't know what that means?
M: You should use a dictionary.
Q: What does the man want the woman to use?

59. W: Is the machine ready to run?
M: Almost. It still needs fuel.
Q: What does the machine need?

60. M: Who is going to serve the food?
W: Robert is.
Q: What is Robert going to do?
option: get the food from the store
take the food to the kitchen
put the food on the table
remove the food from the table

topic.question:
61. M: The car needs gas, oil and water.
W: Just put in gas.
Q: What is the woman telling the man?
option: to put gas in , but nothing else
to put in oil and water, but not gas
to put oil in the water

topic.question:
62. M: What are you waiting for?
W: For you to apologize.
Q: What does she expect the man to do?

63. W: What started all this?
M: There was something highly flammable in the back room.
Q: What are they talking about?

64. M: What do you want to know?
W: The purpose of all this.
Q: What does the woman want to know?
option: She wants to know the cost
She wants to know the cause
She wants to know the answer.
She wants to know the reason.

topic.question:
65. W: Waiter. I ordered a steak well done.
M: I will take it back and have it cooked some more.
Q: Why this meat needed to be cooked longer?

66. M: What happened to your coat?
W: It wore out.
Q: What did the woman mean?
